content.1: And the sons of the prophets said unto Elisha, Behold now, the place where we dwell with thee is too strait for us.
content.2: Let us go, we pray thee, unto Jordan, and take thence every man a beam, and let us make us a place there, where we may dwell. And he answered, Go ye.
content.3: And one said, Be content, I pray thee, and go with thy servants. And he answered, I will go.
content.4: So he went with them. And when they came to Jordan, they cut down wood.
content.5: But as one was felling a beam, the axe head fell into the water: and he cried, and said, Alas, master! for it was borrowed.
